account.import.subtitle: Bitte erstellen Sie ein Konto im Mixin-Netzwerk auf eine der folgenden Arten
account.import.title: Fennec ist eine Wallet von Mixin-Netzwerk.
account.init.hint: Please create a Mixin Network Account with one of the following ways
address.note.hint: Give the address a label for easy recognition
address.use.memo: If there is an address label, digital ID or remarks, you can use Memo
auth.request.warning: Only approve this request if you trust the application. Approving gives the application access to the addresses of your accounts.
auth.tip: Only approve this request if you trust the application. Approving gives the application access to the addresses of your accounts.
back.confirm.safe: I confirm I’m aware and have kept the keystore files safe
back.confirm.warn1: This is so important that we thought it's not too much to emphasize once again:
back.confirm.warn2: Please make sure you have saved your keystore files to somewhere safe and private. If not, you might lose access to your assets. And there is absolutely NO WAY to recover.
back.warn1: Keystore file is the ONLY way to access your assets in Mixin Network.
back.warn2: Please backup your keystore file and keep it safe.If you lost it, you won't be able to log back into your wallet once you log out. There is NOT means to recover it.
back.warn3: If someone else has your keystore file, they will be able to access your wallet. Your assets will be subjected to risks of being stolen.
confirm.remove: Are you sure you want to remove the account?
confirm.remove.text: After completing this action, we can't recover you wallet until you provide the keystore file. Be sure to save keystorefile before deleting any account!
confirm.reset.application: Are you sure you want to reset application?
confirm.reset.application.text1: You must know what you are to do. This action will clear all the personal data in this merchine includes keystore files.
confirm.reset.application.text2: Make sure you have a effective backup, otherwise you might lose your wallet!
contact.support.hint: If you encounter a problem you can't solve, or have a better suggestion for a product, please feel free to contact us
deposit.attention.eos: Attention: Please try a small amount for the first deposit. Both a Memo and an Address are required to successfully deposit your {name}.
deposit.attention.try: For first deposit to a new address, please try a small amount!
deposit.confirmations: Deposit will arrive after at least {confirmations} block confirmations
deposit.step1.title: Step 1 : Copy Address
deposit.step2.title: Step 2 : Copy Memo
deposit.tip.btc: This address only supports BTC and Omni USDT.
deposit.tip.eos: This address supports all base on EOS tokens, such as EOS, IQ, BLACK, OCT, KARMA, etc.
deposit.tip.eth: This address supports all ERC-20 tokens, such as ETH, XIN, TUSD, HT, LOOM, LEO, etc.
deposit.tip.tron: This address supports all TRC-10 and TRC-20 tokens, such as TRX, BTT, USDT-TRON, etc.
deposit.title: {name} Deposit
deposit.warning: For first deposit to a new address, please try a small amount!
error.cannot.access.keystore: Cannot access your profile with provide keystore
fee.withdraw: A transaction fee of {fee} {feeAssetSymbol} is required for withdrawing {symbol}
import.by.provider.notice.text: After you have created an account using the account service provider, please be sure to set a strong password and backup the keystore you just created to a safe place. If you lost your keystore, Fennec won't be able to help you recover it. You will forever lose the access to your assets.
import.by.provider.notice.title: Important notices about mandated accounts
import.from.dashborad: Import a bot account from Mixin Developer Dashboard
memo.hint: Address label, digital ID or remarks
message.password.letters.last: password should has at last 18 letters
message.password.letters.least: password should has at least 6 letters
message.wallet.name.require: Please give a default name for your wallet
name: Name
password.forgot.hint: If you has backed keystores, you could reset application and then import these keystore file
password.warning: The password is the only way to unlock and backup your wallet.
provider.add.warning: Make sure your provider is reliable, otherwise you might suffer unpredictable loss.
wallet.name: Wallet Name
